results.content:
I liked the fact that the sections are not overloaded with content and present mostly the common elements, like for exemple methods and properties. It gives a good idea on how to use them. Then one can always go to a js reference doc and get the whole list. 
Very useful the Recap & Practical Exercise Session at the end of every section. My advice is to reproduce all of them as it really helps learning the syntax faster. It would be nice to have them in a downloadable form, although it might have prevented me from going through the practice session so thoroughly, so in the end maybe it's better this way.

results.content:
To me it's an awesome video tutorial for JS. I stated to learn JS from this tutorial and dreaming to reach my level best. I saw the steps of tutorial which make learning process easy and friendly as anyone can go through the course . The real small  project  could be more effective, whatever, for me as a new learner I can bet this one is best yet. I like to more tutorial about DOM and some real project  showing practical details all upcoming videos as soon as possible.
in essence it's a worthy. thanks

results.content: A bit slow paced, but overall I learned quite useful stuffs. Couple of the lessons have slight sound related issues. Apart from this, it is a good beginner friendly course. If anybody wants to learn JS from the scratch, this course will certainly be right one.

results.content: Enayet gave a concise and engaging presentation of Javascript basics. I was able to reinforce some of the fundamentals that I felt I hadn't mastered before and throughout the process, he answered my questions and gave me some real-world examples. Highly recommended for the beginning coder looking to solidify JS fundamentals while preparing for a web dev Bootcamp.

I was able to reinforce some of the fundamentals that I felt I hadn't mastered before and throughout the process, he answered my questions and gave me some real-world examples. Highly recommended for the beginning coder looking to solidify JS fundamentals while preparing for a web dev Bootcamp.

results.content: Although I have had some knowledge of javascript programming prior to taking this course, I found this course quite rewarding in terms of knowing more details about a number of concepts. This course is ideal for absolute beginners. But for experienced programmers, this course is very basic. The course is a bit slow paced. Anyway, overall it is a recommendable course. Hope instructor will keep adding new materials in this course.

results.content: Der Kurs ist wirklich gut. Es wird alles langsam und ausführlich erklärt. An ein paar Stellen wird Code allerdings zu kurz eingeblendet und direkt weitergesprungen. Es wäre nett noch eine halbe Stunde hinten dranzugehen und Promises und async/await zu diskutieren, aber der Kurs ist ja auch als Einsteigerkurs deklariert.
